law.history: Repealed 1972 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 3, sec. 93, effective January 1, 1973. -- Repealed 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 270, sec. 8. -- Amended 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 105, sec. 11. -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 8, sec. 14.

metadata.lrc-note: Due to a clerical error the enrolled bill (Acts 1972, ch. 270) does not show the repeal of this section; this compilation attempts to correct the error.
